contents.text: Eli and the Red Hat Blown by the Wind
Eli and Mom went for a walk down at the grassland. It was a windy day.

Wooosh!

The strong wind blew Auntie Antelope's red hat!

 "Help me catch my hat. My red hat!" she cried.

So the two elephants run up and down the grassland after the flying red hat blown by the wind.

A strong wind.
Can you tell me a time when you were active with your Mom?
contents.subtext: Active means any things you do that makes you sweat or out of breath. For example: running, playing in the park, dancing, or swimming.

contents.text: What do you like when you were active with your Mom?
Thinking about the fun things of physical activity can make it more enjoyable!
Do you want know what's going to happen next?
contents.subtext: To read the rest of the story you and your Mom have to complete a one-week challenge.
